mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(REPORTCARD) FROM BINFORMATION WHERE REPORTCARD LIKE '%'||#{SerialUUID}||'%'
SELECT COUNT(LICENSE) FROM BINFORMATION WHERE LICENSE LIKE '%'||#{SerialUUID}||'%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BINFORMATION (ESTID, TAXATION, CRN, BRANDNAMING, REPRESENTATIVE, MAINLOCATION, DETAILLOCATION, LATITUDE, LONGITUDE, EMDCODE) VALUES ( #{estid}, #{taxation}, #{crn}, #{brandnaming}, #{representative}, #{mainlocation}, #{detaillocation}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{emdcode})
mapper.select: SELECT BRANDNAMING, MAINLOCATION, DETAILLOCATION FROM BINFORMATION WHERE ESTID=#{estid}
SELECT * FROM BINFORMATION B, (SELECT ESTID FROM CBOOKMARK WHERE MEMBERID=#{memberid}) A WHERE B.ESTID=A.ESTID

SELECT B.ESTID, B.TAXATION, B.CRN, CASE WHEN LENGTH(BRANDNAMING) > 4 THEN CONCAT(SUBSTR(BRANDNAMING,1,4),'..') ELSE BRANDNAMING END AS BRANDNAMING, B.REPRESENTATIVE, B.MAINLOCATION, B.DETAILLOCATION, B.REPORTCARD, B.LICENSE, B.LATITUDE, B.LONGITUDE, B.STATUS, B.PREMIUMBOOLEAN FROM BINFORMATION B,(SELECT * FROM BESTABLISHMENT WHERE BPERSONID=#{bpersonid}) A WHERE B.ESTID=A.ESTID

SELECT B.ESTID, NVL(I.STOREIMG, '-') AS MAINIMG, B.BRANDNAMING, M.DEFAULTCATEGORY, B.MAINLOCATION, B.DETAILLOCATION, NVL(R.GPA,0) AS GPA, M.DELIVERYBOOLEAN,R.REVIEWNUM FROM BINFORMATION B
INNER JOIN (SELECT ESTID, REPLACE(ADDRESSA || ' ' || ADDRESSB || ' ' || ADDRESSC || ' ' || ADDRESSD || ' ' || ADDRESSE || ' ' || ADDRESSE, ' -', '') AS COMPARE FROM BDELIVERYAREA) D ON B.ESTID=D.ESTID
LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT AVG(GPA) AS GPA,COUNT(*) AS REVIEWNUM, ESTID FROM BREVIEW GROUP BY ESTID) R ON B.ESTID = R.ESTID LEFT OUTER JOIN BMANAGEMENT M ON B.ESTID = M.ESTID LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM BIMAGE WHERE DELEGATEPHOTOBOOLEAN='Y') I ON B.ESTID=I.ESTID WHERE B.STATUS='SUCCESS'
AND COMPARE=#{MainAddress}
AND PREMIUMBOOLEAN='Y'
AND PREMIUMBOOLEAN='N'
ORDER BY GPA
mapper.update: UPDATE BINFORMATION SET MAINLOCATION = #{mainlocation}, DETAILLOCATION = #{detaillocation}, LATITUDE = #{latitude}, LONGITUDE = #{longitude}, EMDCODE = #{emdcode} WHERE ESTID = #{estid}
mapper.select: SELECT STATUS FROM BINFORMATION WHERE ESTID = #{value}
SELECT BRANDNAMING, LATITUDE, LONGITUDE FROM BINFORMATION
